text: Nikoloz "Nika" Gvaramia (; born June 29, 1976) is a Georgian lawyer, politician and businessman who had held posts of Minister of Justice and Minister of Education and Science. He was Director General of Rustavi 2.He is Founder and Director General of Mtavari Arkhi (2019-). He is married and has three children. ==Other websites== * Georgian Biographical Dictionary Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:United National Movement (Georgia) politicians Category:Government ministers of Georgia (country) Category:Members of the Parliament of Georgia Category:Jurists
title: Nika Gvaramia
